name: UniFi Network

description.fr_FR:
UniFi Network - Connexion à un controleur UniFi Network.
Permet certaines actions (Localiser, Gérer LED du site, Mise à jour Firmware, PowerCycle/Activation/Désactivation POE sur switchs, Activation/Désactivation/Reboot des Point d'accès, Activation/Désactivation des WLAN, Bloquer/Débloquer/Gestion présence des clients WiFi, etc)

N'a pas la vocation de remplacer l'interface du controleur

Non supporté : UniFi Protect & UniFi Access & UniFi Talk & UniFi Connect
description.en_US:
UniFi Network - Connect to a UniFi Network controller
Allow some actions (Localization, Manage site LED, Update Firmware, PowerCycle/Enable/Disable POE on switchs, Enable/Disable/Reboot AP, Enable/Disable WLAN's, Block/Unblock/Presence management of Wi-Fi clients, ...)

Does not replace Controller Web Interface

Not supported : UniFi Protect & UniFi Access & UniFi Talk & UniFi Connect

WARNING : Not supported : Debian Buster(10) Stretch(9) Jessie(8) & Jeedom Mini+ & Raspberry Pi 1-2 & Zero (armv6) & i386 (32bits)
description.es_ES:
Red UniFi - Conexión a un controlador de red UniFi.
Permite ciertas acciones (Localizar, Gestionar LED de sitio, Actualizar Firmware, PowerCycle/Activar/Desactivar POE en switches, Activar/Desactivar/Reiniciar Puntos de Acceso, Activar/Desactivar WLANs, Bloquear/Desbloquear/Gestionar presencia de clientes WiFi, etc)

No pretende sustituir a la interfaz del controlador

No soportado: UniFi Protect & UniFi Access & UniFi Talk & UniFi Connect
description.de_DE:
UniFi Network - Verbindung zu einem UniFi Network Controller.
Ermöglicht bestimmte Aktionen (Lokalisieren, Standort-LEDs verwalten, Firmware-Update, PowerCycle/Aktivierung/Deaktivierung von POE auf Switches, Aktivierung/Deaktivierung/Reboot von Access Points, Aktivierung/Deaktivierung von WLANs, Blockieren/Entsperren/Anwesenheitsverwaltung von WiFi-Clients, usw.)

Soll die Controller-Schnittstelle nicht ersetzen

Nicht unterstützt: UniFi Protect & UniFi Access & UniFi Talk & UniFi Connect
description.it_IT:
Rete UniFi - Connessione a un controller di rete UniFi.
Consente alcune azioni (localizzazione, gestione del LED del sito, aggiornamento del firmware, PowerCycle/attivazione/disattivazione del POE sugli switch, attivazione/disattivazione/riavvio degli Access Point, attivazione/disattivazione delle WLAN, blocco/sblocco/gestione della presenza di client WiFi, ecc.)

Non è destinato a sostituire l'interfaccia del controller

Non supportato: UniFi Protect & UniFi Access & UniFi Talk & UniFi Connect
description.pt_PT:
Rede UniFi - Ligação a um controlador de rede UniFi.
Permite determinadas acções (localizar, gerir o LED do local, atualizar o firmware, ciclo de energia/ativar/desativar POE nos comutadores, ativar/desativar/reiniciar pontos de acesso, ativar/desativar WLANs, bloquear/desbloquear/gerir a presença de clientes WiFi, etc.)

Não se destina a substituir a interface do controlador

Não suportado: UniFi Protect & UniFi Access & UniFi Talk & UniFi Connect

utilization:
Si votre équipement est dans votre controleur UniFi Network mais ne semble pas supporté (à part Protect/Access/Talk/Connect) contactez moi je l'ajouterai.

ATTENTION : Non supporté : Debian Buster(10) Stretch(9) Jessie(8) & Jeedom Mini+ & Raspberry Pi 1-2 & Raspberry Zéro (armv6) & i386 (32bits)
author: Nebz
